name: Smart Money Bunny
description:
Made by team No Fun Allowed for McGame Jam 2017.

You're a rabbit on a shopping spree. Punch, push, and throw groceries into your cart in an effort to spend as much as possible! Items on your grocery list are worth more~

Gamepad Controls:
Punch / Swipe : Right & left bumpers
Jump : A
Grab / Throw : X

Keyboard/Mouse Controls:
Punch / Swipe : Q & E
Jump : Space
Grab / Throw : R

Credits:
Design, Programming, Music - No Fun Allowed (Frank Brizuela & Monica Pabin)
Grocery Assets - OneCoinGames (https://www.assetstore.unity3d.com/en/#!/content/75494)
